channel.title: Anti SYI
channel.description: Hey guys i needed help with Anti SYI if anyone can tell me how to put in anti syi. i would be happy. But when i try multiple times i get errors :\ Help please. What the cause of this is that when people are playing 30 min later.. everyone laggs and all like including me i log in and log out log in and out i saw these two players log in the same time iped them. Anyways can you guys help? thanks PM me if you got msn and you are willing to help! :D

item.title: Anti SYI
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

[quote=“Editt, post:5, topic:313311”]1 error:

disconnected == true;[/quote]
Delete one of the '='s and the ‘p.’

Read full topic

item.title: Anti SYI
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:313311”]Here is a quick-fix. In client.java Declare: Now the Writeload part is delta, so if that give you an error tell me. I may be able to help you get it working.

public void checkSyi()
{
int junk = inStream.readDWord();
if (junk < 1) {
disconnected == true;
writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
}
}

Now, [i]BEFORE[/i] your welcome message, put this:

checkSyi(); [/quote]

Learn code conventions.

Read full topic

item.title: Anti SYI
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Here is a quick-fix. In client.java Declare: Now the Writeload part is delta, so if that give you an error tell me. I may be able to help you get it working.

public void checkSyi()
{
int junk = inStream.readDWord();
if (junk < 1) {
disconnected == true;
writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
}
}

Now, [i]BEFORE[/i] your welcome message, put this:

checkSyi();

Read full topic
